venue.address_1: 1 Boylston Place (in the alley, entrance next to sweetwater and across to liquor store)
venue.name: Estate Nightclub

item.description:
Hi everyone,

I found this info session and networking where a lawyer will be discussing different types of US visas and how to qualify for them.. The event is for free, which is really rare since the lawyer fees are really high here. Here's the link if you want to attend -> http://immigrationbootcamp.eventbrite.com/#

Hope to see you there,
Asi

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Immigration Info Session & Networking
